trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Zelienople
There were 2 other sightings in Zelienople on or around April 9th 2012
Summary: for the past week and a half myself, my 12 yr old son and his mother, on four different occasions witnessed amber colored orbs hovering in the sky. On two occasion we witnessed a brightly lit disc flying overhead at about five hundred feet.
divs: Sighting Detailsas i stated above myself as well as various others i have been with have witnessed orange orbs as well as dimly lit discs that seemed to spin, we could actuall see the windows, which were almost square. On one occasion, last june we witnessed a orange light hovering, it ommited a dull hum, amd dropped out what looked like hundreds of lightning bugs into a tree twenty feet from us. As i said there is without a doubt an alien presence what sems to be every time i go outside at night. I am beginning to think that they are attracted to me, am I crazy??
